item.title: ABOUT
item.author: xfious@outlook.com (XFious)
item.description:
Xiaonan Fu

  • Email: xfious@outlook.com
  • Github: xfious
  • Github: xiaonanfu-ucsd

Skill set

  • Web development and electron-based desktop development; Javascript/Typescript + HTML + CSS, MySQL
  • Python + Pytorch
  • C/C++, Java, Node.js, Rust
  • Android native app development
  • CUDA
  • Linux administration and maintenance + Docker

Research Interest

  • Training and deployment of multi-modal large models.
  • Memory-augmented large language models, using vector database as memory.

other topics

  • iterative thinking process of LLM
    • Diffusion-based language model
    • Tree of thought, chain of thought
  • Meta-learning
  • Reinforcement Learning, GAN, and new learning methods (learning objective) derived from them.
